hero.description: From idea to product: clear, modern, and results-focused development. Technology that makes a difference.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description:
A selection of my recent work.
Each project represents a unique challenge and solution.

project1.title: Script2me
project1.description: A solution to the limitations of AI chatbots, such as restricted file attachments, with a platform that accelerates the development of any type of web or mobile application using AI.

project2.title: EmpleaWorks
project2.description: A website for job searching and posting job offers, featuring user management and secure authentication. Focused on the Murcia region, Spain.

project3.title: EmpleaWorks - Mobile App
project3.description: Mobile application derived from the EmpleaWorks website, allowing users to search for jobs from their mobile devices. Features real-time notifications and an intuitive interface.

project4.title: SkillPilot
project4.description: Tool that automates job searching across multiple portals and optimizes applications using AI. Developed with Laravel, React, Docker and custom AI agent based on Llama 3.3.

projectsPage.title: All Projects
projectsPage.subtitle: Explore my complete portfolio of projects, from web applications to mobile apps and innovative solutions.
projectsPage.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria
projectsPage.ctaDescription: We can talk via  email or LinkedIn. I am always open to new opportunities and collaborations.

project2: Candidates can create profiles and apply to offers
project4: Integration with job portal APIs for automated searching based on user preferences
Cover letter generation and CV optimization based on each specific job offer

projectDescriptions.project3: Mobile application derived from the EmpleaWorks website, allows users to search for jobs from their mobile devices. Includes real-time notifications and an intuitive interface.
projectDescriptions.project4: Tool that automates job searching across multiple portals and optimizes applications using AI. Developed with Laravel, React, Docker and custom AI agent based on Llama 3.3.
projectDescriptions.project5: Mobile application with token authentication that connects to a REST API developed with Laravel to serve data.
projectDescriptions.project6: Wine store with CRUD operations for wines, category management and shopping cart. Includes authentication system and user management.

projectLongDescriptions.project3: An enterprise-grade analytics dashboard that leverages artificial intelligence to provide deep insights into business data. The platform includes machine learning models for predictive analytics, automated report generation, and real-time data visualization. Built with modern technologies and designed for scalability.
projectLongDescriptions.project4: An advanced job automation tool that revolutionizes job searching through artificial intelligence. SkillPilot integrates multiple job portals, automates job searching based on user preferences, and optimizes applications through a custom AI agent. Features intelligent cover letter generation, CV optimization for each specific offer, and complete application process tracking.
projectLongDescriptions.project5: A collaborative development platform designed for programming teams. Includes project management tools, integrated version control, issue tracking, sprint planning, and team performance metrics. Built with modern technologies to facilitate effective collaboration.
projectLongDescriptions.project6: A comprehensive inventory management system specifically designed for wine cellars and wineries. Includes stock tracking, sales analytics, supplier management, restock alerts, and detailed reporting. The application is optimized for handling products with specific characteristics like vintage, region, and variety.

project1.longDescription: This comprehensive e-commerce platform was built from the ground up using modern web technologies. It features a complete shopping cart system, secure payment processing through Stripe, user authentication, order management, and an admin dashboard for inventory control. The platform is fully responsive and optimized for performance.

project2.longDescription: A cross-platform mobile application designed for fitness enthusiasts. The app tracks workouts, monitors progress, and provides personalized training plans. It features real-time data synchronization across devices, social features for sharing achievements, and integration with wearable devices.

project3.longDescription: A modern project management dashboard built with Next.js and TypeScript. Features include task management, team collaboration tools, real-time updates, file sharing, and comprehensive reporting. The application uses Prisma for database management and includes role-based access control.

about.title: Passionate about development, innovation, and progress.
about.description1: I’m a full stack developer specializing in building innovative web and mobile applications. I’m passionate about creating modern solutions that make a positive impact on society.
about.description2: My experience covers developing projects always with a real problem in mind, from concept to implementation. I focus on creating intuitive and efficient applications that enhance the user experience.

degree1.title: Advanced vocational training in computer programming
degree1.institution: José Luis Castillo Puche technical school
degree1.description: Comprehensive program covering modern web development technologies, database management, and software engineering principles.

degree2.title: Meta Data Analytics Course issued by Meta
degree2.description: Professional certification in data analysis, statistical methods, and data visualization using industry-standard tools and methodologies.

exp1.title: Plugin Developer & Web Solutions Specialist
exp1.description: Development of specialized native plugins for Moodle and WordPress, as well as robust web applications with Laravel for European projects. Collaboration in international teams using English as working language, focused on creating innovative educational solutions and custom content management platforms.

I’m fully available to relocate to any city.
